thread.section_title: Bank4dh 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 Bank4dh 的点评意见 | bank4dh.com
thread.title: Luis

author: Luis
title: Luis
text:
I meet bank4dh in-game. Actually I had never use a service to buy game things before, i've always throught it was a scam somehow. But in the customer support, just being curious, i added 'em to skype, and started selling game currency to them.
I was scared at the first time. I thought I was giving my in-game gold for nothing. they ask me for my Paypal address to pay me. And in less than one minute, there was my payment.
I started selling game currency, and now those days, i'm also a buyer, they manage to help me and guide me, give me some tips, and here am I.
From now, I'm always doing sales/purchases to them!
This may be non-interested for somebody who read this, but it really chaged my life, since i'm from Venezuela, USD are expensive, and the life is hard! Now it isn't! I've never thought that playing a game, and meeting such a good company could actually change my life in many ways
THANK YOU BANK4DH, THANK YOU CHERRY!
